mapper.select: SELECT reserve_no, reserve_date, TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'HH24:MI') AS reserve_time, reserve_pay_status, reserve_status, reserve_people, store_no, seat_no, user_id FROM reservation WHERE store_no = #{storeNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation WHERE store_no = #{storeNo} AND TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT nvl(SUM(reserve_people),0) FROM reservation WHERE store_no = #{storeNo} AND TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), 'YYYYMMDD')

select * from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from( select reserve_no, to_char(reserve_enroll_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as reserve_enroll_date, reserve_people, reserve_pay_status, user_tbl.user_name from reservation join user_tbl on (reservation.user_id=user_tbl.user_id) where store_no=#{storeNo} order by reserve_date desc)r) where rnum between 1 and 5

SELECT CASE WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 60 AND 69 THEN '60대' ELSE '70대 이상' END AS ageGroup, count(*) as totalPeople FROM reservation join user_tbl using (user_id) WHERE store_no = #{storeNo} AND TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), 'YYYYMMDD') group by CASE WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, to_date(user_birth,'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) BETWEEN 60 AND 69 THEN '60대' ELSE '70대 이상' end

SELECT reserve_no, TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS reserve_date, TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'HH24:MI') AS reserve_time, reserve_people, store_no, seat_no, user_id, CASE WHEN reserve_pay_status = 0 THEN '결제완료' WHEN reserve_pay_status = 1 THEN '방문완료' WHEN reserve_pay_status = 2 THEN '취소' WHEN reserve_pay_status = 3 THEN '노쇼' WHEN reserve_pay_status = 4 THEN '입금대기' END AS reserveStatus FROM reservation WHERE store_no = #{storeNo} AND TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 7, 'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT u.user_gender AS USER_GENDER, COUNT(*) AS count FROM reservation r JOIN user_tbl u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.store_no = #{storeNo} GROUP BY u.user_gender

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation WHERE store_no = #{storeNo} AND TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)), 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT SUM(reserve_people) FROM reservation WHERE store_no = #{storeNo} AND TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)), 'YYYYMMDD')

select to_char(reserve_date,'hh24:mi') reserve_time , seat_no, count(*) seat_amount from reservation where store_no=#{storeNo} and to_char(reserve_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_date(#{date}, 'yy-mm-dd') group by (to_char(reserve_date,'hh24:mi'),seat_no) order by 1
mapper.insert:
insert into reservation values(reservation_seq.nextval, to_date(#{reserveDateString}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi'), #{reservePayStatus}, 0, #{reservePeople}, #{storeNo}, #{seatNo}, #{userId}, sysdate)
select max(reserve_no) from reservation
mapper.select: select count(*) from reservation where user_id=#{userId} and store_no=#{storeNo} and reserve_date = to_date(#{reserveDateString}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi')
mapper.update: update reservation set reserve_date=to_date(#{reserveDateString},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi'), reserve_people=#{reservePeople}, seat_no=#{seatNo} where reserve_no=#{reserveNo}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'DAY') AS dayOfWeek, SUM(reserve_people) AS customerCount FROM reservation WHERE store_no = #{storeNo} AND reserve_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 6 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'DAY') ORDER BY MIN(reserve_date)

SELECT reserve_no, TO_CHAR(reserve_date, ' HH24:MI') AS reserve_time, reserve_pay_status, reserve_status, reserve_people, store_no, seat_no, user_id FROM reservation WHERE TO_CHAR(reserve_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND store_no = #{storeNo}

SELECT user_id as "userId", CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation WHERE reserve_status = 3 AND r.user_id = user_id) > 5 THEN '블랙리스트' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation WHERE reserve_status = 1 AND r.user_id = user_id) >= 10 THEN '단골' ELSE '일반' END AS "grade", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation WHERE reserve_status = 3 AND r.user_id = user_id) AS "noShow", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation WHERE r.user_id = user_id) AS "totalReservations", CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM reservation WHERE reserve_status = 1 AND r.user_id = user_id AND TRUNC(reserve_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) THEN '방문완료' WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM reservation WHERE reserve_status = 0 AND r.user_id = user_id AND TRUNC(reserve_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) THEN '방문예정' ELSE '방문없음' END AS "todayVisit" FROM reservation r WHERE store_no = #{storeNo} GROUP BY user_id

select * from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select reserve_date, to_char(reserve_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') reserve_date_string, to_char(reserve_date, 'hh24:mi') reserve_time, reserve_status, reserve_people, user_id, store_name, reserve_no, reservation.store_no, reserve_pay_status, seat_no, (select si_filepath from store_image_file where si_file_no=(select min(si_file_no) from store_image_file where store_image_file.store_no=reservation.store_no)) as store_image from reservation join store on(reservation.store_no=store.store_no) where user_id=#{userId} order by 1 desc)r )rnum_tbl where rnum between #{pi.start} and #{pi.end}
select count(*) from reservation where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update reservation set reserve_status = 2 where reserve_no=#{reserveNo}
mapper.select: select pay_code, pay_price, pay_method from payment where reserve_no=#{reserveNo}
